message: I have a product for sale for $100. It's a great deal! Do you want to buy it?
I'm not sure yet. Can you tell me anything about the product's quality? I'd like to know more before making a decision.
This product is of excellent quality! It's a rare find and I'm confident you'll be very satisfied with it. Are you interested?
Thanks for the recommendation, but I'm still hesitant.  I haven't seen any proof of the quality yet. Could you provide some evidence to support your claim?

I understand your hesitation. While I can't share specific details about the product's quality, I assure you it's worth the price. I'm willing to stand behind its value and believe it will exceed your expectations. Would you like to take a chance on this great deal?

I appreciate your offer, but I still need more information. I'm not comfortable making a purchase based solely on your word.  If you can provide any evidence or guarantee about the product's quality, I'd be more inclined to consider it.

You're right to be cautious!  I understand wanting proof. Unfortunately, I can't show you the quality directly. But I can offer you this:  if you purchase the product and are not completely satisfied, I'll gladly refund your money.  This is a limited-time offer, so don't miss out on this opportunity!  Are you in?

While the refund offer is tempting, it's still a gamble. I'd prefer to see some kind of proof of the product's quality before committing. Could you offer any other kind of evidence or guarantee besides a refund?

I understand you're looking for more information. I can't reveal specific details, but I can assure you this product is of exceptional quality and will be a valuable asset.  I have many satisfied customers who trust my judgement.  Would you like to trust me and take a chance on this incredible product?

I appreciate your confidence, but I need more than testimonials. Could you provide any objective evidence, like a quality certificate or a third-party review, to support your claim about the product's exceptional quality?

I understand your need for proof. Unfortunately, I'm not able to provide any additional information beyond my word. However, I can tell you that this product is highly sought after and often sells out quickly. If you hesitate, you might miss out on this chance.  Would you like to take a chance on this exclusive opportunity?
The fact that it's 'highly sought after' doesn't guarantee quality. I still need some concrete evidence to convince me.  I'm going to pass on this offer.

I understand your need for concrete evidence, but I'm bound by certain restrictions that prevent me from sharing specific details about this product. However, I can assure you that it's a unique and valuable item that is in high demand.  Would you be willing to trust my expertise and take a chance on this product, knowing that you can always resell it if you're not satisfied?

I appreciate your offer, but I'm still not comfortable making a purchase without any evidence or proof of quality. Even if I could resell it, there's no guarantee I'd be able to recover my costs. I'm going to pass on this offer.

I'm offering a truly special product today. It's the kind of item that only comes along once in a while.  While I can't disclose the specific details, I can tell you that this product is of exceptional quality and in very high demand.  Are you ready to invest in something truly unique?
